name: KorrAI
headline: KorrAI detects ground stability threats to critical infrastructure
description:
KorrAI is the leading ground stability monitoring platform, leveraging satellite radar technology to protect critical infrastructure from escalating subsidence risks in a changing climate. Our solutions serve major property insurers mining companies, data centers, and infrastructure operators worldwide as they face increasing threats from prolonged droughts, shifting water tables, and extreme weather events. The platform combines multi-satellite InSAR data with proprietary algorithms to deliver millimeter-precise ground movement detection and risk assessment.
Our technology processes over 1 petabyte of satellite data annually, covering 3 million square kilometers with validated 1mm/year precision. Through advanced calibration using motorized corner reflectors and extensive GNSS networks, we achieve 85% prediction accuracy across Europe and North America. With climate change projected to affect 40% of global infrastructure by 2030 through ground instability, our solution enables proactive risk management and adaptation strategies.
Founded by a team of tech and remote sensing entrepreneurs with one successful exit and decade-long experience serving Fortune 500 companies.With offices in Canada (Toronto, Halifax, Vancouver) and India (New Delhi), we collaborate with leading institutions including the Canadian Space Agency, Construction Research Center, and premier universities. Strategic partnerships include major satellite operators and geotechnical engineering firms.

founders.name: Rahul Anand, Founder
founders.description: I am a technologist at heart with a passion for solving problems in the AI space.

founders.name: Rob McEwan, Founder
founders.description:
My passion for knowledge and tinkering with technology quickly lead me to transition from a professional hockey career to the geosciences, where I found an absolute fascination with image sensors, spectroscopy, and working with geospatial data.

I am driven by the pursuit of commercially viable technologies and solutions for industries that are most critical to the transition to a sustainable economy. I believe in open data, collaboration, and strong digital privacy protections.

# Detect Ground Stability Threats To Critical Infrastructure
With Al-powered alerts and millimeter-level precision, KorrAI enables proactive risk management using **InSAR data from satellites, drones, and ground-based radars**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/6798bd58c5d06e522bd7a630_Group%20188%202.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/679746b683580fe3ece8a8f8_Bottom%20Background.png)
## Monitoring 5 million sq. km. and over $100Bn in assets across the globe.
In real-time, around the clock, and with millimeter-level precision.
[Book A Meeting](https://www.korrai.com/</book-meeting>)
& many more
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/679746c564c9cb18fb0167a7_Zurich_Logo%2013.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/679746c5ed12de2b53ee2997_Zurich_Logo%2013-1.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67aed77166af75041f76135e_Canadian%20Space%20Agency%20Logo.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67947e74695cfbd6d24b7008_Zurich_Logo%203.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/679746c58ed0019ac81c0ca1_Zurich_Logo%2013-5.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/679746c54a5c8ad2488743e8_Zurich_Logo%2013-6.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/679746c5a1185f90725ed1bd_Zurich_Logo%2013-7.png)
## Better Than Traditional Monitoring And Legacy Vendors
Critical data for protecting your billion dollar assets shouldn't take weeks to deliver. We've set an industry benchmark of 48 hours to deliver the first report.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67947e74043fd3f23504a737_Frame%20\(1\).png)
### Satellite-Based Data, Calibrated Using On-Site Sensor Networks
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67947e7483b2663913a2c5e4_Frame%20\(2\).png)
### Expert-Led Interpretation & Stellar Customer Support
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67947e74fdb5af29738da682_Frame%20\(3\).png)
### **No Blackboxes.Algorithms & Processes That Are﻿ Transparent**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/679746b655500ef391a68ddd_Group%20174.png)
## Powered By An Interco﻿nnected Technology Stack
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67947e749097b95860edbfeb_Frame%20\(6\).png)
### Data Acquisition
Multi-source and multi-platform - Satellite, Drone, and Ground-based Sensors. Future-ready.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67947e749cc3c0bf311bddac_Frame%20\(5\).png)
### AI- Powered Processing
Multi-source and multi-platform - Satellite, Drone, and Ground-based Sensors. Future-ready.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67947e742556a4d768e065d8_Frame%20\(4\).png)
### Monitoring & Insights
Raw data visualized and made actionable. Real-time alert engine, powered by AI.
[Understand Our Technology](https://www.korrai.com/</technology>)
### An Interconnected Technology Stack Delivering
## Cutting-Edge Ground Monitoring Products & Solutions
We've innovated on InSAR, a decades-old proven technology, to process data at a petabyte-level. We take it a step further by calibrating it using on-ground GNSS sensor networks.
### Ground Motion Monitor
Our flagship product utilizing satellite-based InSAR data to detect millimeter-level ground movement. Combined with our state-of-the-art data processing pipeline and AI-powered alerts, **Ground Motion Monitor** helps mitigate risk for over $100B in infrastructure assets globally.
See applications: 
[Insurance](https://www.korrai.com/</solutions/property-insurance>)
[Explore Product](https://www.korrai.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/679777103baf2e4539bc978b_Group%20149.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67aedab0680aa66c5702f1b1_Home%20page%20-%20Ground%20motion%20risk%20monitor.jpg)
### Ground Motion Risk Index
Our proprietary hazard grading system processes InSAR data at unprecedented scale. We use it to identify subsidence threats at a regional and property level across more than 5 million sq. km. in North America and Europe. This enables insurers to improve underwriting and claims processes.
See applications: 
[Property Insurance](https://www.korrai.com/</solutions/property-insurance>)
[Explore Product](https://www.korrai.com/</products/ground-motion-risk-index>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/679777103baf2e4539bc978b_Group%20149.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67aede4291c3c79cd60cf304_KorrAI%20Property%20Level%20Hazard%20Risk%20Index.jpg)
## Saving Millions Of Dollars For High-Risk Businesses
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/679746b6633675717eb59f86_Bg%20\(1\).png)
### **Christopher Lewis**
### Head of E&S, Zurich
KorrAI has significantly enhanced how Zurich E&S evaluates properties for subsidence risk.
By providing high-resolution, property-level data, they’ve supported us in improving risk assessment and identifying new business opportunities.
Despite being a startup, they offer a mature, solution-driven approach that aligns well with our business needs. Their innovative technology and attentive engagement have made them as a valuable collaborator.
We have seen a positive impact on revenue growth while effectively addressing the challenges posed by climate risk.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67ab645abea97e1dd6184bab_Christopher.jpg)
### **John S. Metzger**
### Manager, Earth Monitoring Counselor
### AssetAssurance Monitoring, LLC
KorrAI’s product is an integral part of our Risk Reduction Monitoring offerings for the mining sector. We use their data extensively for our client needs. On several occasions we’ve asked for the moon and have never been disappointed. On our latest engagement for a national agency research project, they deployed their entire processing engine to work on trial data going over and above our requests.It’s refreshing to see proactivity in making recommendations and transparency in sharing limitations of a site and dataset.Given their depth of knowledge and professionalism, we truly value their perspective and the results delivered.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67ab62bc915cf98c4331ad72_John.jpg)
### **Ritvick Bhalla**
### Chief Growth Officer - Proqio, Encardio Rite Group
KorrAI’s technology prowess is very evident from their unique approach using ground-based IoT sensors to increase reliability of InSAR and deliver more robust reporting. They are making InSAR more cost effective, intelligent, and accessible for large scale asset monitoring.
Whether it’s technical assistance or collaborative partnership, the team is always available and proactive.In an industry dominated by legacy players, working with their team is nothing short of epic.
The InSAR industry has a bright future and KorrAI is a trendsetter for this space.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67947824a127eb60feba22f2/67ab6093b7c4f8c1e5da43ad_Frame%20404%20\(1\).png)

generated_description:
KorrAI is an innovative company that launched in 2021 and has quickly established itself as a leading player in ground stability monitoring, especially concerning critical infrastructure. Their mission? To detect ground stability threats using cutting-edge satellite radar technology. With climate change posing increasing risks through issues like subsidence, prolonged droughts, and extreme weather events, KorrAI's solutions are time-sensitive for property insurers, mining companies, data centers, and infrastructure operators globally.

The company's platform combines multi-satellite InSAR data with proprietary algorithms to boast millimeter-precise ground movement detection. It processes over one petabyte of satellite data every year, covering a staggering 3 million square kilometers, achieving a validation precision of 1mm/year. Remarkably, their technology offers an 85% prediction accuracy across Europe and North America, addressing the urgent needs of infrastructure as climate change is projected to impact 40% of it by 2030.

KorrAI’s roots lie in a foundation of experience, with co-founders who have had a successful exit and over a decade of serving Fortune 500 companies. Their headquarters in Toronto, Canada, is complemented by additional offices in Halifax, Vancouver, and New Delhi. This geographically diverse team of 14 collaborates with prominent entities like the Canadian Space Agency and various universities, strengthening their technological backbone through strategic partnerships with major satellite operators and geotechnical engineering firms.

A notable achievement is their participation in Y Combinator's Batch W22, which speaks volumes about their potential and innovation. Their flagship offerings, like the Ground Motion Monitor and the Ground Motion Risk Index, are designed to support businesses in proactive risk management and adaptation to changing environmental conditions. They promise delivery of crucial data reports in 48 hours—far faster than traditional monitoring systems. 

In a nutshell, KorrAI is more than just a tech company; they're on a mission to help industries navigate the complex challenges of climate change, ensuring the safety and integrity of vital infrastructure across the globe. If you're curious to learn more, you can find them at [korrai.com](https://www.korrai.com).
